description: The dosing parameters and edit history of the treatment plan.

columns.name: TREATMENT_PLAN_ID
columns.description: The treatment plan ID.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number that corresponds to a set of dosing parameters for the treatment plan in this row.

columns.name: TPL_DOSING_WEIGHT
columns.description: The dosing weight for the treatment plan in this row.

columns.name: DOSING_WEIGHT_INST
columns.description: The date/time in external format when the dosing weight was recorded for the treatment plan in this row.

columns.name: TPL_DW_SOURCE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The source of the treatment plan weight for the treatment plan in this row.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Treatment plan weight


Past measured weight


Most current measured weight (actual)


Ideal body weight


Adjusted body weight


User entered weight


Lean body weight


Dosing weight


Other

columns.name: TPL_DW_COMMENTS
columns.description: The dosing weight comments for the treatment plan in this row.

columns.name: TPL_WT_ALERT_LEVEL
columns.description: The dosing weight alert threshold percentage for the treatment plan in this row.

columns.name: TPL_DOSING_HEIGHT
columns.description: The dosing height in centimeters for the treatment plan in this row.

columns.name: TPL_DOSING_HT_INST
columns.description: The date/time in external format when the dosing height was recorded for the treatment plan in this row.

columns.name: TPL_HT_SOURCE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The dosing height source for the treatment plan in this row.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Treatment plan height


Past measured height


Most current measured height (Actual)


User Entry


Other

columns.name: TPL_HT_COMMENTS
columns.description: The dosing height comments for the treatment plan in this row.

columns.name: TPL_DOSING_BSA
columns.description: The dosing body surface area (BSA) for the treatment plan in this row.

columns.name: TPL_BSA_SRC_C_NAME
columns.description:
The source of the dosing body surface area for the treatment plan in this row.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Treatment plan BSA


Based on weight and height measured in the past


Based on most recent measured weight and height (actual)


User Entry


Based on ideal body weight and current/past measured height


Based on adjusted body weight and current/past measured height


Based on dosing weight and current/past measured height


Based on normalized BSA 1.7m2


Other

columns.name: TPL_BSA_CALC_DESC
columns.description: The dosing body surface area calculation source and details for the treatment plan in this row.

columns.name: TPL_BSA_COMMENTS
columns.description: The dosing body surface area comments for the treatment plan in this row.

columns.name: TPL_BSA_ALERT_LEVEL
columns.description: The dosing body surface area alert threshold percentage for the treatment plan in this row.

columns.name: TPL_TARGET_AUC
columns.description: The target area under the curve (AUC) for medication orders in the treatment plan in this row.

columns.name: TPL_DPARAM_USER_ID
columns.description: The user who updated the dosing parameters for the treatment plan in this row.

columns.name: TPL_DP_UPD_INST
columns.description: The date/time in external format when this line of the dosing parameters was updated for the treatment plan in this row.

columns.name: TPL_DOC_WEIGHT
columns.description: The last documented weight in kilograms for the treatment plan in this row.

columns.name: TPL_DOC_WT_INST
columns.description: The date/time in external format when the documented weight was recorded for the treatment plan in this row.

columns.name: TPL_DOC_HEIGHT
columns.description: The last documented height in centimeters for the treatment plan in this row.

columns.name: TPL_DOC_HT_INST
columns.description: The date/time in external format when the documented height was recorded for the treatment plan in this row.

columns.name: TPL_DOC_BSA
columns.description: The body surface area (BSA) in meters squared corresponding to the documented weight and height for the treatment plan in this row.

columns.name: TPL_DOC_BSA_CALC
columns.description: The description of how the body surface area was calculated from the documented weight and height for the treatment plan in this row.

columns.name: TPL_IDEAL_WEIGHT
columns.description: The ideal weight based on the documented height for the treatment plan in this row.

columns.name: TPL_IDEAL_BSA
columns.description: The body surface area (m2) based on the ideal weight and recorded height for the treatment plan in this row.

columns.name: TPL_IDL_BSA_CALC
columns.description: The description of how the body surface area was calculated from the ideal weight and recorded height for the treatment plan in this row.

columns.name: TPL_ADJ_WEIGHT
columns.description: The adjusted weight based on the ideal weight  and recorded height for the treatment plan in this row.

columns.name: TPL_ADJ_BSA
columns.description: The body surface area (m2) based on adjusted weight and recorded height for the treatment plan in this row.

columns.name: TPL_ADJ_BSA_CALC
columns.description: The description of how the body surface area was calculated from the adjusted weight and recorded height for the treatment plan in this row.

columns.name: ADJ_WT_CORR_FACTOR
columns.description: This item contains the correction factor to  use for adjusted weight calculations in this treatment plan.

columns.name: CRCL_FORMULA_LPP_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the programming point that will be used by medications setup to calculate area under the curve (AUC) doses by using the treatment plan level creatinine clearance formula.

columns.name: CRCL_FORMULA_LPP_ID_LPP_NAME
columns.description: The name of the extension.

columns.name: BSA_FORMULA_ID
columns.description: Body surface area formula to use when calculating body surface area (BSA) in treatment plan orders.

columns.name: BSA_FORMULA_ID_LPP_NAME
columns.description: The name of the extension.
